name: Geneillogical
description:
This game was made in 3+3 hours for Trijam 103.

Version 1 can be found here.

Content warning: this is actually a horror game and some subjects depicted might not suit all audiences.

Drag and drop your family icons and make sure each child is linked to the correct parents. You can also drag the screen around to move it.

Game currently has a demo ending.
